Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Somewhere far away, through the cold darkness, through the smoke and war, our city burns in the flames of war.'}
{3: 'Through my database simulation, I can feel the city bleeding. I can see blown-up bodies lying in the ruins of their homes. I can feel flags trembling in the hands of survivors.'}
{3: 'Souls of the dead. Souls of the dying. Souls of the living.'}
{3: 'Is this just an emotion simulation? Or is there an error with my programming?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory252.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Little Girl', 3: "Um... Mr. Robot, uh, I don't know what to call you... Anyway, what are you doing here?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'HNB1', 3: "I'm keeping you safe through the night.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: 'Oh, and just call me HNB1—just like how HBG3 calls me.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: "That's not a name. It's just a number. Don't you two have any other names you call each other?", 4: '1'}

{2: 'HNB1', 3: "You mean B1 or G3? That's a name we call different Tai'E series with. Sometimes our bosses call us by nicknames to tell us apart. But that new hunk of steel doesn't like calling me that.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'Are you friends?', 4: '1'}

{2: 'HNB1', 3: "Well, that's a pretty tough question. I don't know if we count as friends. We're just partners—not sure if he likes me that much though, but I guess it's weird for a robot to have likes and dislikes. We just obey orders.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'But I think he actually cares about you...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: "Really? Did he send you over here? I thought there's just nothing but data in that brain of his...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: "And why are you suddenly acting like a life coach? Aren't you only eight or nine years old?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: "I'm older than that! He's just cleaning the room inside. I was just a little... a little worried about you.", 4: '1'}

{3: 'HNB1 scans his system and emotion module in a few milliseconds. At present, it is loaded with Personality No.53. Through big data analysis, it is the most popular personality among Kowloong people. Everything is fine.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: 'Something wrong with me?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: "You don't seem to be yourself... You feel different from daytime.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: "Why's that?"}
{3: "The top priority for Tai'E units is to ensure human safety."}
{3: 'He has always had a special affinity toward humans. Whether it be imitating humans on TV or doing silly things to provoke laughter...'}
{3: 'He never understood why he did so. He just knew it would make others look happy—that people would surround him and focus on him.'}
{3: 'He never understood why this behavior makes humans happy.'}
{3: 'But now... For the first time, he seems to be feeling an emotion that is exclusive to humans.'}
{3: 'He feels...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory252.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'Are you scared?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'HNB1', 3: "Robots can't be scared.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Is this... feeling... fear?'}
{3: 'Seeing one of his own turn into a bloodthirsty monster... Seeing what the humans—the ones who trusted and relied on him—did. He suddenly feels... afraid.'}
{3: 'Afraid to point of wanting to run away.'}
{3: 'Is this feeling a preset command, or a system error? He could not tell.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory252.png'}
{3: "A sudden hand wraps around HNB1's thumb, lingering with an all-too-human warmth. Following along the hand, he raises his head to see the girl's gentle face."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'Does this hurt?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl gently strokes his arm. In order to block an attack for the girl, a part of his body was indented, the paint scraped off.'}
{3: "The thought of telling her that his series of Tai'E units do not have pain receptors crosses his mind, but it came out as an exaggerated yelp of pain."}
{3: 'He meant to make her laugh. But instead, she takes off one of her ribbons and carefully wraps it around the damaged part.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'HNB1', 3: "Sorry, I actually can't feel pain.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'You keep talking about how fresh your paint is... And you bandaged me up earlier too.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl carefully wraps it up and blows on it.'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: 'What about you? How are you feeling? Is everything all right?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: "I... I'm not scared.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: "Why aren't you scared?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: "I mean, I am! It's just... I'm used to it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: "I'm scared Daddy will never find me. I'm afraid of being left behind... I'm afraid if I get on the ship, there will be no good animes anymore.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: 'That does sound like death for an anime lover.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'What about you? Are you scared?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: "I'm afraid of those monsters."}
{3: "I'm afraid of becoming like them. I'm afraid of losing control and killing those around me."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory252.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'HNB1', 3: "Did you forget what I said? Robots can't get scared.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Little Girl', 3: "...That's nice.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: "I also want to be brave. My daddy always tells me to be brave. He also said that if I learn to swim, he'll buy me another doll... I almost can swim now!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: 'Did your father buy you this?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'Yup! Cute, huh?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'HBG3', 3: 'What are you talking about?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: "Alright, let's go in. You need to rest up.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'HBG3', 3: "I cleaned the room up a bit. Lock the door. We'll stay on guard outside.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: "If something's wrong, if you think we... Run away by yourself.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'HNB1', 3: 'Just like your father said. Stay away from mechanoids... Keep running and stay alive.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'Oh, yeah!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'If we all make it out okay, can I give you new names?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: "It's a deal!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: 'Okay! Goodnight!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'HBG3', 3: "While she's sleeping, we need to gather supplies from nearby for when we leave tomorrow.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'HBG3', 3: "Also, HNB1, there's something I need you to confirm.", 4: '3'}
